title: Ep. 35 Sex Therapy with Courtney Geter
description:
What exactly does a sex therapist do? Is there such thing as too much sex? Are there any unhealthy fetishes? Can things get lost in your "na-na"? This week the ladies had sex therapist Courtney Geter, LMFT on the show to answer all things sex! Listen as we peak into the world of a sex therapist and even get answers about our own sex lives!

Check out our sponsors!
